alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 9:00PM CDT until March 29 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Yockanookany River Near Ofahoma affecting Leake County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tuscolameta Creek At Walnut Grove affecting Leake County. Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County. Pearl River At Jackson affecting Rankin and Hinds Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tuscolameta Creek At Walnut Grove. * WHEN...Until Tuesday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 27.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 27.3 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage Monday evening. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Tuscolameta Creek Walnut Grove 25.0 27.2 Thu 8 pm CDT 27.2 26.7 25.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 1100 AM CDT.
